setEffects.2: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuffs by {{1}}%.
setEffects.4: Increases CRIT Rate by {{1}}%. The wearer deals {{2}}%/{{3}}% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least {{4}}/{{5}} debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by <unbreak>100%</unbreak>, lasting for {{6}} turn(s).
